name: The Ultimatest Battle
description: The Ultimatest Battle is a real-time, 2D platform game in which two teams compete in different game modes with an almost completely destructible environment. UB is a true Free-to-Play, absolutely no Pay-to-Win.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space
